description: Introduction to Yoruba as spoken in Nigeria. Introduction to Yoruba tone through orally oriented approach. Linguistic and cultural implications of the greetings. Background cultural and historical readings. Lab required.

Undergraduate Prerequisites: (CASLO112) - Oral review of tonology and introduction of new morphological and syntactic structures. Continued emphasis on oral communication skills; development of reading and writing. Lab required.

Undergraduate Prerequisites: (CASLO211) - Oral review of tonology and introduction of new morphological and syntactic structures. Continued emphasis on oral communication skills; development of reading and writing. Lab required. Satisfactory completion of CAS LO 212 fulfills the CAS language requirement.
